full_summary:
### Multi-Year Full-Depth Reclamation & Bituminous Surface Treatment Tender

#### Solicitation Number
EZ899-230060/C

#### Publication Date
2022-08-17

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-09-01T17:00:00

#### Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada is seeking a contractor to perform a multi-year full-depth reclamation and bituminous surface treatment project at various locations along the Alaska Highway, British Columbia.

#### Key Requirements
- A 2-year contract to perform full-depth reclamation and bituminous surface treatment at various locations along the Alaska Highway, British Columbia.
- Work includes, but is not limited to, pulverizing bituminous surface treatment and base course material, gravel placement, blending, shaping, and compacting pulverized material, and applying bituminous surface treatment.
- Two (2) laborer’s to rake center line seam, remove large rocks that make their way through the spreader and other areas as required.
- Sweep complete road surface as often as necessary to remove all loose material completely off road surface over fore slope.

#### Delivery Date
All work, including clean-up and demobilization, must be completed by September 30, 2024.

#### Value of Project
The estimated cost of the project is between $5,000,001 to $20,000,000.

#### Procurement Process
The bid solicitation is a two-phase competition. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all bidders, and the second phase will invite the qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Delia Martin, Supply Specialist
(778) 707-2139
Delia.Martin@pwgsc.gc.ca

### Documents and Attachments
Documentation for the tender can be found at the following link:
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/16/a7206a18e91110e57dbcf6eea404241f/ABES.PROD.PW_PWY.B036.E9167.EBSU000.PDF
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/16/82de900ddc52209d8fe294d12aef1f8c/ABES.PROD.PW_PWY
